name: delivery
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: delivery
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the act of taking goods, letters, parcels, etc. to people's houses or places of work

example.eg: We get two deliveries of mail (= it is delivered twice) a day.
example.egtrans: 我们每天会接收到两次邮件。

example.eg: You can pay for the carpet on delivery (= when it is delivered).
We expect to take delivery of (= receive) our new car next week.
example.egtrans: 我们预计下周能拿到新车。

dsense.name: delivery
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the way in which someone speaks in public
trans_examp.trans_cn: 演讲风格（或方式）；表演风格（或方式）

trans_examp.trans_en: in some sports, such as cricket or baseball, the act of throwing the ball towards the person with the bat, in order for that person to try to hit the ball

example.eg: That was a good delivery from Thompson.
example.egtrans: 那是汤姆森投出的一个好球。

example.eg: The pitcher is famous for the speed of his delivery.
example.egtrans: 那个投手以投球速度快而闻名。

dsense.name: delivery
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.
